column3: Latest; Banteay Meanchey province: According to preliminary reports
column4: a boy was bitten by a snake while washing his feet in a water jar near his house.------ The incident happened at 7:30 pm on February 25
column8: Banteay Mean Chey Province.------Parents of the 11 year old chopped the head off the snake and took the boy to  Thmar Puok Referral hospital
